description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Amsterdam 2016
http://gotoams.nl

Barry O'Reilly - Entrepreneur, Business Advisor & Author of Lean Enterprise

ABSTRACT
The acceleration of change impacts technology, consumer expectations and economic models. The lifespan of companies is tumbling, from a 67 year average in the 1920s to 15 years today.
Are you responding? How? Organization wide transformation [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/amsterdam-2016/presentation/Enterprise%20Just%20Got%20Entrepreneurial

title: Enterprise Just Got Entrepreneurial
